pr_title: [CDAP-17246] Fixes js error while importing from hub or adding pipeli…

timeline.message:
[CDAP-17246] Fixes js error while importing from hub or adding pipeline from wrangler

- Fixes plugins with spaces in labels to show preview data
- Fixes selecting nodes/connections using keyboard to copy/paste
- Fixes e2e tests failing in 6.2.2
- Fixes nodes copied from 6.1.x version of CDAP to pasteable in 6.2.x

timeline.bodyText: Does this still need the hyphen-replacement fix?
timeline.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText: This is done only on id. This shouldn't affect the pipeline. This is needed only for multiselect.
replies.author: ajainarayanan
